textTemplates.name: AdditionalInformationProvided
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Annual review request - Additional information provided

Dear {!$Record.Owner_Name__c}

Additional information that was requested from the participant has been provided.

Annual Review details

Annual review ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status__c}
Participant(s){!$Record.Participant_Names__c}
View annual review 
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: AnnualReviewCancelled
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Annual review Cancelled

Dear {!$Record.Primary_Participant_Firstname__c}

The Annual Review request submitted for {!$Record.Property_Address__c} has been cancelled.

Annual Review details

Annual review ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status__c}
Cancellation Reason{!$Record.Cancellation_Reason__c}
Submitted on{!$Record.Submitted_Date__c}
Submitted by{!$Record.Primary_Participant_Firstname__c}
Participant(s){!$Record.Participant_Names__c}
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: AnnualReviewComplete
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Annual Review Completed

Dear {!ParticipantFirstName}

The verification of the annual review request submitted for {!$Record.Property_Address__c} has been completed.

Annual Review details

Annual review ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status__c}
Submitted on{!$Record.Submitted_Date__c}
Submitted by{!$Record.Primary_Participant_Firstname__c}
Participant(s){!$Record.Participant_Names__c}
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgAnnualReviewRequest
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Annual review submission required

Dear {!$Record.Primary_Participant_Firstname__c}

An annual review for the property {!$Record.Property_Address__c} is due on {!$Record.Due_Date__c}.

Please submit your annual review using the portal.


Submit annual review 

If you have not logged into the portal before, please contact the State Revenue Office to finish setting up your account.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgSubmissionParticipants
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Annual review request submitted

Dear {!ParticipantFirstName}

We’ve received your annual review request.


Annual review details

Annual review ID{!$Record.Name}
Status{!$Record.Status__c}
Submitted on{!$Record.Submitted_Date__c}
Submitted by{!$Record.Primary_Participant__r.FirstName} {!$Record.Primary_Participant__r.LastName}
Participant(s){!$Record.Participant_Names__c}
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: SecondaryParticipants_VerifySubmission
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Annual review verification

Dear {!ParticipantFirstName}

Please verify the annual review request submitted by {!$Record.Primary_Participant_Firstname__c} for {!$Record.Property_Address__c}.


Verify annual review 

If you have not logged into the portal before, please contact the State Revenue Office to finish setting up your account.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: SecondaryParticipants_VerifyUpdates
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Annual review update verification

Dear {!ParticipantFirstName}

Please verify the updates to the annual review request submitted by {!$Record.Primary_Participant_Firstname__c} for {!$Record.Property_Address__c}.


Verify updates 

sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: VerificationReminder
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Annual review submission verification reminder

Dear {!TaskOwnerName}

This is a reminder to verify updates to the annual review request submitted by {!$Record.Primary_Participant_Firstname__c} for {!$Record.Property_Address__c}.


Verify updates 
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

© State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
